content: I think I'll use a mix of these ideas to create a unique and festive atmosphere. I'll also make sure to have plenty of candles and string lights to create a warm and intimate ambiance. Speaking of ambiance, I recently took a Thai cooking class with my sister, and we learned how to make Pad Thai, Green Curry, and Tom Yum soup from scratch. I was surprised by how easy it was to make the perfect Pad Thai at home, and I've been whipping it up for lunch every week. Do you have any other suggestions for Thai-inspired decorations or ambiance that I could incorporate into the dinner party?
